name: Free Floating Speedometer With Driving Score
description: Simple Floating Speedometer With Over Speed Notification  Speedometer Display : - Display in KM/Hour or Mile/Hour - Movable / Draggable floating speedometer - Simple Interface  Overspeeding : - Adjustable Default Speed Limit - Ring Loop Per 3 Second while Overspeed with Different Color (Orange) - Ring Loop Per Second while Overspeed > 25 KM/Hour (16Mph) with Different Color (Red)  Driving Score : - Realtime Driving Score  - Driving Score Statistics With Chart - Harsh Acceleration (HA) Counter (3 Level) - Harsh Braking (HB) Counter (3 Level) - Speeding Duration Counter (3 Level) - Recording Maximum Speeds - Driving Distance - Driving Duration - Idling Duration  Notes : - Consume Battery (using GPS), use only when needed. - Need to allow all permissions especially the floating windows permission. - Some android phone models will kill the app running in the background, allow and trust the app in the phone manager (usually on the battery settings)   Keywords : Over Speed, Speed Limit, Speedometer, Speed Meter, Speeding, Map Companion, Navigation, Navigate, Map Navigation, Driving, Drive, Driving Score, Driving Behaviour, Driving Statistics, Driving Stats, Realtime Driving Score, Driving Stats, Harsh Acceleration, Harsh Breaking, Over Speeding
